title: Youth of the Nation
brief_description: A unique perspective on the Eureka Stockade story created by a Eureka 150 youth ambassador in a special Digital Storytelling Workshop to celebrate 150 years since the famous rebellion. Tara from Redan told this story because “…its my greatest expertise. I’m young, I’m surrounded by young people everyday and advocate on behalf of them so it makes sense”.
